name: @swc/plugin-feature-flags
description: SWC plugin for feature flag transformation - build-time marking and runtime dead code elimination

scripts.build: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg swc_ast_unknown' cargo build --release -p swc_plugin_feature_flags --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/release/swc_plugin_feature_flags.wasm .
scripts.build:debug: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg swc_ast_unknown' cargo build -p swc_plugin_feature_flags --target wasm32-wasip1 && cp ../../target/wasm32-wasip1/debug/swc_plugin_feature_flags.wasm .

author: 강동윤 <kdy1997.dev@gmail.com>
